surveys.title: Reach Your Audience Wherever They Are
surveys.description: Alium makes it effortless to collect feedback across every channel — from websites and apps to emails and in-page experiences.

cards.title: Web Survey
cards.subtitle: Engage Visitors Instantly on Your Website
cards.desc: Create beautiful, responsive surveys that blend seamlessly with your site’s design — perfect for gathering feedback, measuring satisfaction, or running quick polls in real time.

cards.title: Link / Email Survey
cards.subtitle: Reach People Directly in Their Inbox
cards.desc: Send personalized surveys through email or shareable links. Ideal for NPS, post-purchase feedback, or customer satisfaction studies — no setup, just share and collect.

cards.title: In-Page Survey
cards.subtitle: Capture Contextual Insights as Users Browse
cards.desc: Trigger short, unobtrusive surveys within specific pages or user journeys. Understand what visitors think in the moment — right where they interact.

cards.title: Pop-Up Survey
cards.subtitle: Spark Quick Responses Without Interrupting Flow
cards.desc: Launch lightweight, customizable pop-up surveys that appear at the right time — exit intent, scroll depth, or time on page. Get instant insights without hurting experience.

cards.title: App Survey
cards.subtitle: Understand User Sentiment Inside Your App
cards.desc: Collect feedback from mobile users directly within your iOS or Android app. Perfect for post-update reviews, feature testing, or in-app experience optimization.

conversionSection.title: Turn Every Click into a Conversation
conversionSection.description: Stop guessing what your customers want — ask them, right where it matters. With Alium, you can launch beautiful, on-brand surveys that capture real opinions in real time. Understand what drives satisfaction, uncover friction points, and make smarter decisions backed by your visitors' voice — not assumptions.

integrations.title: Integrate with your favorite tools.
